name: Multi-Batch Mode Implementation
observations: 4th generation mode added: 'multi-batch' (2-14 refs → batch output)
Distinct from 'multi-image' (2-14 refs → single blended output)
Tab label: 'Batch Generation' with Layers icon
Mode type added to GenerationMode union in supabase/types.ts
Dedicated slider shown when >=2 images uploaded in multi-batch mode

name: Batch Output Display Enhancements
observations: View mode toggle: slideshow vs grid view for batch results
Download All button for batch generations
Grid view: 2-4 columns with hover overlay for actions
Slideshow view: Embla carousel with thumbnail strip
AnimatePresence for smooth view mode transitions
